data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Izabal to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Izabal, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Izabal, Guatemala.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Izabal, Guatemala.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Izabal.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 78,454 believers in Izabal, Guatemala a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Izabal, Guatemala who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 78,454 believers in Izabal that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Izabal, Guatemala that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
